content.rendered:
The Extreme 180 NEXT-GEN  is now with ENDO frame and same design as The Straighty One80

The awning for Utes without canopies or wagons, set up in a matter of seconds.

The setting up and packing up is a 1 person job and can be done in only seconds.

The design of the Extreme is focused on the Hinge providing unmatched strength in this category free from poles and ropes. Manufactured from high quality and durable square tube aluminium frame.

The Canvas is a 600D Ripstop Canvas with PU waterproof coating and a UV 50+ rating. In the grey colour the canvas has good heat repellent to keep you nice and cool in the shade. With an impressive 6mtr span when open, its a free standing awning with the inclusion of 2 built in legs for when the breeze picks up.

Pack up Size:

2000 long x 180 high x 140 wide

20kg

Inclusions:

  • Unique Rope Ratchet to secure the awning on the side
  • Heavy Duty L Brackets
  • All nuts and bolts

Using a Rhino Platform or any North -South plank running platform? Then you will need to look at our platform bracket options. (Not included as standard)
